li.text: X-axis: Horizontal movement (left / right) of the Saddle along the Bed.
Y-axis: Back and forth Spindle movement on Machine Bed.
Z-axis: Vertical movement (up / down) of the Spindle Head on the Saddle.

para.style: text-align:center; line-height:1.50;
text-align:center; line-height:1.50;
